node.title: Episode 13- LIGHT (Lay Institute for Global Health Training)
node.description: LIGHT, or Lay Institute for Global Health Training, is devoted to hastening Jesus’ return by training and equipping men and women to work as health evangelists. The ministry’s goal is to expand health evangelism around the world by helping their graduates establish centers of health and healing. LIGHT works closely with churches and conferences worldwide, training lay members to use health to share God’s love with their families, friends, and communities.
